mapper.sql: id, user_no, update_time, create_time, real_name, guide_level, bg_img_url, age, sign, tag, work_year, intro, guide_card_no, id_card, id_card_front_pic, id_card_side_pic, audit_status, status

if.test: startTime != null and startTime!='' and endTime!='' and endTime !=null

trim.if: and create_time between CONCAT(#{startTime},' 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#{endTime},' 23:59:59')

mapper.select: select count(g.id) from guide_info g where MONTH(g.create_time)=#{month}
mapper.insert: insert into guide_info (id, user_no, update_time, create_time, real_name, guide_level, bg_img_url, age, sign, tag, work_year, intro, guide_card_no, id_card, id_card_front_pic, id_card_side_pic, audit_status, status ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{guideLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bgImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{guideCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCardFrontPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCardSidePic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

mapper.update:
update guide_info
user_no = #{userNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
guide_level = #{guideLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bg_img_url = #{bgImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},

id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id_card_front_pic = #{idCardFrontPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id_card_side_pic = #{idCardSidePic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update guide_info set user_no = #{userNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, guide_level = #{guideLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bg_img_url = #{bgImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sign = #{sign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tag = #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_year = #{workYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, intro = #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, guide_card_no = #{guideCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_card_front_pic = #{idCardFrontPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_card_side_pic = #{idCardSidePic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
